column4: ok, for some reason I'm having issues sharing files between two Ubuntu machines. I have Samba installed on both of em, and created a share on one, but the other one won't access it
samba is for sharing with windoze. You want to use ssh
oh? there a UI for connecting via that method? >.<
Not sure. Just use something like 'scp /path/to/file 192.168.1.102:/home/username' for instance
